examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: talk to someone

Sent from my mobile.
                                                             


Can I please have a phone number to talk to someone about my monthly charge? Thanks

Describe your issue: I need to talk to someone about a billing issue right away please.

What kind of problem?: Other

What do you need help with?: I can't sign into Canva Pro and am being charged for it.  Can someone tell me how to?  I've tried everything.  Also, can you guys get a phone so we can talk to a live person about things, please???

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Is there someone I can talk to about my problem?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Is there someone I can actually talk to about a problem ?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I need to talk to someone ASAP

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: This is not acceptable that I cannot talk to a live person about an issue with my account.  I have been over-billed.
What do you need help with?: can i talk to someone please

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: hi there I need someone that I can talk with

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I tried reaching out to talk with someone about our subscription.  Please let me know if I can get someone to talk to.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Need to talk with some one about my subscription
What do you need help with?: I want to talk to a representative
What do you need help with?: I want to talk to a representative
What do you need help with?: I want to make an every door direct mailer and want to talk to a representative if this is possible using canva

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Is there someone I can talk to, as the issues I'm having I cannot find help for.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: can we talk about some issuses on your site?
Describe the issue: not able to talk to a human
What do you need help with?: Talk to a representative about my account

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Can I TALK to someone regarding my refund?
call me at <NUMBER>

What do you need help with?: I want to talk to someone who can help me with a recent print order.

Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Would like to talk to someone regarding changing my email and then losing my subscription and flyers that were already made.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: billing error - Was billed by Canva and have no idea why.  I need to talk to someone today.  Call <NUMBER>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Can someone please reach out to us via email regarding an issue with Canva? We are premiere members and would like to continue our membership so long as we can resolve this issue. Talk soon!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have Canva Pro but other people on my team use it too and I'm confused by what our options are and costs. I would like to talk with someone about the different plans.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I need to talk to a Canva Representative

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I need to talk to someone about my accounts.  <NUMBER>, or <EMAIL>  Thank you.
What do you need help with?: who can i talk to about the promotion that we are trialling?  We would like to purchase a year but we have 7 not 5 people???

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I would like a refund of my $119.40 and close my account. I do not know how to operate this website. I also would like a number where I can actually TALK with someone please. Thank you!

Affected order: PAES2YCjq5I

Category: Other

Describe the issue: Please need to talk to contact support, I have filled out like three of these forms and have not heard back. 

Preferred solution: Refund
What do you need help with?: I have a typo on my post card and would like to talk with someone about reprinting

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Security, data storage and personal information. Can I talk with someone about your regulations, privacy and laws in regards to medical information in our designs?
What do you need help with?: Still trying to talk to someone to get our corporate account cancelled as we haven't used it for over a year. My previous help ticket timed out as I missed your response.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: How do i stop the music from playing while im talking on my video. i want the music for my into but not while im talking
